metadata.title: CVE-2015-0252 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
internal/XMLReader.cpp in Apache Xerces-C before 3.1.2 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault and crash) viacrafted XML data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0252` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxerces-c-samples - 3.1.1-5.1~build0.14.04.1
libxerces-c3.1 - 3.1.1-5.1~build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xerces-c package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.1-5.1~build0.14.04.1').
